name: universal-texture-transcoders
description: Lightweight WebAssembly transcoder implementations of universal texture formats.
author: The Khronos Group, Inc.

scripts.asbuild:uastc-rgba32-unorm: asc assembly/uastc-rgba32.ts -u SRGB=0 -b build/uastc_rgba32_unorm.wasm -t build/uastc_rgba32_unorm.wat --optimize --converge --runtime none --noAssert --importMemory
scripts.asbuild:uastc-rgba32-srgb: asc assembly/uastc-rgba32.ts -u SRGB=1 -b build/uastc_rgba32_srgb.wasm -t build/uastc_rgba32_srgb.wat --optimize --converge --runtime none --noAssert --importMemory
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:uastc-bc7 && npm run asbuild:uastc-astc && npm run asbuild:uastc-rgba32-unorm && npm run asbuild:uastc-rgba32-srgb
